changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE example ( `co_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `co_mail` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `co_password` varchar(60) NOT NULL, `co_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `co_surname` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `co_birthday` date NOT NULL, `created_date` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` varchar(14) DEFAULT NULL, `modified_date` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `modified_by` varchar(14) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`co_id`), UNIQUE KEY `co_unq_mail` (`co_mail`) );
